== New In Alpha 6 ==
Remember that all of these features are part of a pre-release version of Kubuntu, and may still have issues. We ask that any problems you come across that you file a bug, if one has yet to be filed for your problem.<<BR>>
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+filebug

=== Simultaneous Kubuntu and Kubuntu-KDE4 releases ===

Alpha 6 is the first alpha release to ship with a <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu-kde4/releases/hardy/alpha-6/|KDE4 CD]]</nowiki>.  Take your pick.  Kubuntu has the tried and tested KDE 3 desktop, Kubuntu-KDE4 has the all new cutting edge KDE 4 desktop.

=== KDE 4.0.2 ===

Kubuntu-KDE4 now includes <nowiki>[[http://dot.kde.org/1204735202/|KDE 4.0.2]]</nowiki>.  It comes with many bug fixes and some new features for plasma, including options to move and resize the panel.

<nowiki>[[File:alpha6.png]]</nowiki>
